project_name.justification: The user provided 'FLORIDA CANYON' as the primary project of interest. The text confirms this is a principal asset of the target company: 'The principal operating assets of FCGI are the Florida Canyon mine in Nevada...'

company_name.justification: The buyer is identified in the text: 'Integra Resources Corp. ("Integra" or the"Company" ) (TSXV: ITR) (NYSE American: ITRG) and Florida Canyon Gold Inc. ("FCGI") (TSXV: FCGV) ... whereby Integra will acquire all of the issued and outstanding shares of FCGI...'

ceo_buyer.justification: The text mentions the CEO of the seller (Florida Canyon Gold), Audra Walsh, but does not name the CEO or any senior officer of the buyer, Integra Resources Corp.

interest_acquired_percent.justification: Integra is acquiring the entire company that owns the project: '...whereby Integra will acquire all of the issued and outstanding shares of FCGI pursuant to a court-approved plan of arrangement...'

primary_commodity.justification: The target company is named Florida Canyon Gold Inc. and is described as a 'junior gold producer'.

verified_article_link.justification: The article discusses the transaction between Integra Resources Corp. and Florida Canyon Gold Inc. The Florida Canyon mine is a principal asset of Florida Canyon Gold Inc.

currency.justification: The provided text does not contain any financial figures for the transaction, so the currency cannot be determined.

cash_payments_raw.justification: The articles discuss voting support for the transaction but do not specify the financial terms, such as cash payments.

share_payments_raw.justification: The articles discuss voting support for the transaction but do not specify the financial terms, such as share payments.

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: The articles discuss voting support for the transaction but do not specify the financial terms, such as a combined payment value.

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: The articles discuss voting support for the transaction but do not specify the number of shares to be issued as part of the consideration.

share_warrant_payments_raw.justification: No mention of share warrants as part of the transaction consideration.

option_payments_raw.justification: No mention of options as part of the transaction consideration.

issued_share_price.justification: The articles discuss voting support for the transaction but do not specify the price of shares to be issued as part of the consideration.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: The text does not mention any exploration commitment in terms of drilling meters.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: The text does not mention any monetary exploration commitment.

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: The text does not mention any Net Smelter Royalty (NSR) as part of the transaction terms.

coverage_area_raw.justification: The text does not specify the coverage area of the Florida Canyon project.

coverage_area_unit.justification: The text does not specify the coverage area of the Florida Canyon project.

resource_size.justification: The text does not contain a quantified mineral resource statement for the Florida Canyon project.

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: The buyer is Integra Resources Corp., whose ticker is explicitly stated in the text: 'Integra Resources Corp. ("Integra" or the"Company" ) (TSXV: ITR) (NYSE American: ITRG)'
